unionFootnotes.*: The 13 PA may not activate or entrench until Turn 3 (July 4th). See Special Rule 3.

unionFootnotes.%: Indicated units begin the game on their disorganized sides. FAIRFAX COURT-HOUSE, July 21, 1861:
unionFootnotes.^: Elzey starts the game embarked and at f0 on his normal side.
unionFootnotes.#: Reference Basic Game Rules section 9.0 for the permanent redoubt Camp Pickens The men having thrown away their haversacks in the battle and left them

unionFootnotes.%: All cavalry units are permanently on their disorganized sides. See Basic Rule Changes, 2.2, “Cavalry”.

unionFootnotes.#: Reference Basic Game Rules section 9.0 for the permanent redoubt Camp Pickens.
